data.title: Do You Know the History of the Nobel Prize in Literature?
data.meta_description: Take this short trivia quiz to see how much you remember about the esteemed award and its past recipients.
data.text:
Welcome to the annual Nobel edition of Lit Trivia, the Book Review’s multiple-choice quiz designed to test your knowledge of books and their authors. In the years between 1901 and 2022, the Nobel Prize in Literature — given for the writer’s body of work — has been awarded 115 times to 119 Nobel laureates chosen by the Swedish Academy. (The award was shared some years.)

In the quiz below, can you identify five previous recipients or the years they received the esteemed award? And after you finish, keep scrolling for more context and commentary about the winners from the archives of The Times.
